::Hakibuscon::

	Hakibuscon had been venturing for what seemed like hundreds of thousands
of millions of days.  He had no idea where he was, except that it was a
desert like area.  Hmmmm.  Where could he be?  He looked around, and all he
saw was sand, sand, sand.  Then, his eyes were drawn to a, a source of
water!  A river!  Yes!  Yes, this told him where he was!  He was in Egypt,
by the Nile River!  Suddenly, he saw a base!!!!!!!!!  Strange place for a
base to be.  Yet, if any cloaked bots dared to try and enter the base, they
would be seen, because of the sand blowing in the wind.  He was tired,
shelterless and defenceless.  He had been hopeless as well until he found
this base.  Here he could find all the solutions to his problems.  He could
rest, be sheltered and maybe even get some new weapons.  But, then he
thought closely for a moment.  First of all, he would have to be careful of
the exterior defences.  Second of all, they might not trust him.  He would
have to make a deal with them.  Yes a perfect deal, whatever side they
were, he would help them fight against their enemies for a couple days. 
Then he would thank them, and leave them.  Yes, that would work, since he
was a neutral bot, showing allegiance to no one.  He stayed a distance, and
tried his comm-link.

	"Is anyone in this base?  I repeat, is anyone in this base?  If you read
me, please tell me your faction.  I repeat, please tell me your faction. 
This is not an enemy trick, I assure you," Hakibuscon said.
